Carlos  es un socio de la ventanilla rural la “Valle Alto”, que está ubicada en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios a hora y media de Ventanas. Son 23 socios en total, que en la mayoridad se dedican a la agricultura. Esto es el segundo préstamo que ellos realizan en la Cooperativa San José.

Carlos se dedica a la agricultura, siembra arroz, maíz y fréjol. Realiza sus compras cada mes en la ciudad de Ventanas y las vende en la misma localidad a precios muy convenientes.

Solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra semillas de  arroz, maíz y fréjol. Piensa que el crédito es una oportunidad para salir adelante. Sus sueños comprar una casa y ponerse un negocio en la ciudad de Ventanas. Enfrenta desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades.

Le gusta jugar fútbol.
texts.en:
Carlos Armando B. C. is 21 years old, single, and lives with his parents in the Ventanas province of Los Ríos. He does not have children.

Carlos is a member of the Communal Bank “Valle Alto” (High Valley), which is located in the district of Voluntad de Dios and an hour and a half away from Ventanas. There are a total of 23 members, most of whom make their living by farming. This is the second loan they have requested with Cooperativa San José.

Carlos is a farmer who grows rice, corn, and beans. He buys each month in the city of Ventanas and sells his products in the same place at very reasonable prices.

The loan he is requesting will be invested in the purchase of seeds for planting rice, corn, and beans. He views this loan as an opportunity to get ahead. His dreams include buying a house and opening a business in the city of Ventanas. Among the challenges he faces are pests and diseases that impact his crops.

He enjoys playing soccer in his free time.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase seeds for planting rice, corn, and beans

loans.name: Mario Jose

texts.es:
Mario Jose C. M., tiene 31 años.  Es soltero y vive con los hijos,  vive en Ventanas provincia de Los Ríos. Tiene 1 hijo, Magnolia.

Maria  es una socia de la ventanilla rural la “Valle Alto”, que está ubicada en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios a hora y media de Ventanas. Son 23 socios en total, que en la mayoridad se dedican a la agricultura. Esto es el segundo préstamo que ellos realizan en la Cooperativa San José.

Maria se dedica a la agricultura, siembra arroz, maíz y fréjol. Realiza sus compras cada mes en la ciudad de Ventanas en Fertiza y las vende en la misma localidad a precios muy convenientes.

Solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra semillas de  arroz, maíz y fréjol. Piensa que el crédito es una oportunidad para salir adelante. Sus sueños comprar una casa y un carro para su familia. Enfrenta desafíos como las plagas.

Le gusta trabajar y hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Mario Jose C. M. is 31 years old. He is single and lives with his daughter. He lives in Ventanas, Los Ríos province. He has one daughter Magnolia. Mario is a member of the rural community bank “Valle Alto”, which is located in the Voluntad de Dios community an hour and a half from Ventanas. There are 23 members in total and the majority work in agriculture. This is the second loan that they have taken out in the San José cooperative. Mario works in agriculture. He plants rice, corn and beans. He makes her purchases ever month in the city of Ventanas at Fertiza and he sells at the same place at very advantageous prices. He is asking for the loan to invest in the purchase of rice, corn and bean seed. He thinks that the loan is a chance to get ahead. His dreams are to buy a house and a car for his family. He faces challenges such as pests. He likes to work and do sports.

Translated from Spanish by Ellen Donohue, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy rice, corn and bean seed

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es:
Jose Manuel P. A., tiene 20 años.  Es soltero y vive con los padres,  vive en Ventanas provincia de Los Ríos. No tiene  hijo.

Jose es un socio de la ventanilla rural la “Valle Alto”, que está ubicada en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios a hora y media de Ventanas. Son 23 socios en total, que en la mayoridad se dedican a la agricultura. Esto es el segundo préstamo que ellos realizan en la Cooperativa San José.

Jose se dedica a la agricultura, siembra arroz, maíz y cacao. Realiza sus compras cada mes en la ciudad de Ventanas en Fertiza y en el comercial Peña y las vende en la misma localidad.

Solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra semillas de  arroz, maíz y cacao. Piensa que el crédito es una oportunidad para salir adelante. Sus sueños tener una economía básica para sustentar a la familia. Enfrenta desafíos como las plagas.

Le gusta estudiar para sacar adelante a la familia.
texts.en:
Jose Manuel P. A. is 20 years old, single, and lives with his parents in the Ventanas province of Los Ríos. He does not have children.

Jose is a member of the Communal Bank “Valle Alto” (High Valley), which is located in the district of Voluntad de Dios and an hour and a half away from Ventanas. There are a total of 23 members, most of whom make their living by farming. This is the second loan they have requested with Cooperativa San José.

Jose is a farmer who grows rice, corn, and cacao. He buys each month in the city of Ventanas in Fertiza and at the Peña commercial market. His products are sold at the same locations.

The loan he is requesting will be invested in the purchase of seeds for planting rice, corn, and cacao. He views this loan as an opportunity to get ahead. His dreams include having a basic economic foundation by which he can support his family. Among the challenges he faces are pests that impact his crops.

He enjoys studying so that his family can get ahead.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase seeds for planting rice, corn, and cacao

loans.name: Ramona

texts.es:
La Sra. Ramona B. D. G. tiene 55 años, esta casada, tiene 3 hijos, D. los cuales dos cursan la educación secundaria y el mayor trabaja y estudia en la facultad.
La Sra. Ramona es modista D. alta costura, se dedica a esta profesión hace más D. 30 años, comenzó muy joven ya que esta profesión fue inculcada por la madre y estudio para poder adquirir mayor conocimiento sobre este trabajo .
Ella primero trabajó en una boutique como diseñadora y   confeccionista D. los pedidos que recibían y así adquirió sus maquinas y empezó a realizar trabajos nocturnos ya  forma independiente, y así después D. unos años se independizó totalmente.
Actualmente cuenta con una importante cantidad D. clientes en su barrio.
Y esta en proceso D. crecimiento D. su negocio y para ello esta equipando con todo lo necesario su taller D. costura para brindar la mayor calidad a sus clientes.
Por ello solicita el crédito para la compra D. una máquina y más telas D. temporada fría.
texts.en:
Ramona B. D. G. is 55 years old. She is married and has three children, two of whom attend junior high school and the oldest works and studies in school. Ramona is a high quality dressmaker and has been doing this for more than 30 years. She started when she was very young, after her mother introduced her to it. She later studied in order to better learn this business. She started off working as a designer and seamstress in a boutique, where she would fill customer orders. In this way, she acquired her sewing machines and later began working on her own in the evenings. After a few years, she ventured exclusively out on her own. Now she has important customers in her neighborhood and she is in the process of growing her business and equipping her tailor shop so that she can proviD. her customers with the best quality products. She is asking for this loan so that she can buy a sewing machine and cold weather fabric.

Translated from Spanish by Hugo Reyes, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Sewing machine and fabric

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes, de 38 años de edad, convive con su pareja y fruto de ellos tienen cinco hijos en etapa escolar. Juntos residen en la localidad de Santa Rosa, ubicada en la hermosa selva ayacuchana, donde tienen su techo propio a base de madera. Antes había sido agricultora, pero por cosas del destino decidió emprender un nuevo proyecto en sociedad con su pareja, que es la fabricación de todo tipo muebles, ya que él sabe diversos modelos y diseños novedosos, eso le da ventaja y mucha satisfacción que su anterior trabajo. Anteriormente tenían que esperar la cosecha, inclusive no le generaba buenas ganancias. Su rutina diaria es a partir de las 7:00 de la mañana hasta las 8:00 de la noche y su punto  de venta lo realiza en el primer piso de su casa. Sus planes a futuro es poder ampliar su carpintería con la necesidad de almacenar e introducir nuevas maquinarias, para que de esa manera minimice tiempo y costo. Este es su octavo crédito con MFP, por el cual se compromete a seguir cumpliendo con su cronograma de pagos, además está satisfecha con su grupo comunal por las ventajas que otorga. Con el crédito que solicita, lo piensa invertir en la compra de madera, como: tornillo, caoba y cedro, con el propósito de cumplir con sus compromisos de entrega, hacia sus clientes más exigentes.
texts.en:
Mercedes is 38 years old. She lives with her partner and their five school-aged children. Together, they live in the town of Santa Rosa, located in the beautiful rain forest of the Ayacucho area. They have their own house made of wood. Previously, Mercedes worked as a farmer, but for reasons of fate, she decided to take on a new project together with her partner: making all types of furniture. Since her partner knows a wide range of models and modern designs, he has an advantage, and this business provides Mercedes with much more satisfaction than her previous work. Previously, they had to wait for the harvest, and even then, it did not provide good profits. Her daily routine starts at 7:00 in the morning and continues until 8:00 at night. Her sales area is on the first floor of her house. Her plans for the future are to expand the carpentry shop, due to the need to store inventory and add more machinery. This will help them minimize time and costs. This is her eighth loan with MFP, and she is committed to continue making her payments on time. She is also satisfied with her communal bank, thanks to the advantages it offers. With the loan she is requesting, she is thinking about investing in buying wood, such as tornillo, mahogany and cedar, with the aim of fulfilling her delivery commitments for her most demanding customers.

Translated from Spanish by Patricia Linderman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying various types of wood

loans.name: Michael

texts.es: Michael, de 25 años de edad, convive son su pareja y tienen una hija. Juntos residen en la localidad de Santa Rosa, ubicada en la hermosa selva ayacuchana, donde tiene su propia casa a base de adobe. Para Michael su vida fue difícil y mucho más cuando egresó de la universidad, siendo un ingeniero de minas, no lograba encontrar un trabajo estable, por que solo se conformó con pequeños trabajos temporales, permaneciendo así durante algunos años. Hasta que tuvo la oportunidad de trabajar como constructor de viviendas y edificios, hoy realiza diversos servicios para entidades públicas y privadas, por lo que le está yendo muy bien, además tiene a cargo de operarios para cualquier trabajo que se presente, desde entonces su situación económica ha mejorado. Su punto de trabajo lo realiza en su propia localidad. Sus planes a futuro es tener su propia constructora, con la finalidad de que pueda mejorar en su economía y su calidad de vida. Este es su quinto crédito con MFP, por el cual se compromete a seguir cumpliendo con su cronograma de pagos, además está satisfecho con su grupo comunal, ya que todos se ayudan entre sí. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará materiales de construcción como topógrafos, picos, palas y barretas con el propósito de minimizar tiempo y costo.
texts.en:
Michael, age 25, lives with his life partner and their daughter in the city of Santa Rosa. It is located in the beautiful Ayacuchan jungle, where he has an adobe house. Life for Michael was difficult, and it was much more difficult when he graduated from the university as a mining engineer. He was unable to find steady work, and he made due with small seasonal jobs. It stayed that way for several years until he had the opportunity to work as a building contractor for homes and buildings. He now provides diverse services for public and private entities. Therefore, it is going very well for him. Also, he has a group of workmen for whatever work that presents itself. Now his financial situation has improved. He does his work locally. His plan for the future is to have his own construction company. The reason for this is to be able to improve his finances and his quality of life. This is his fifth loan with MFP. He pledges to continue making his payments on time. Also, he is pleased with his communal bank because everyone helps each other. He will use the requested loan to buy construction materials like surveying equipment, pickaxes, shovels, and nail pullers. He will do that to minimize time and cost.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy construction materials

loans.name: Modesto

texts.es:
El señor es casado, vive en el barrio San Miguel de la ciudad de Pilar, su señora es ama de casa, es empleada del estado.
Posee casa propia, con las comodidades dentro del bienestar familiar, posee móvil de transporte propio, camioneta, moto.
El mismo es comerciante, también cuenta con una  empresa de servicios que realiza la actividad de ventas de servicios de comidas.
Solicita el crédito para compras de insumos para su negocio como: harina, fideos, azúcar, lácteos, panificados, aceites y otros.
Cuenta con una antigüedad en el ramo más de 10 años.
Agradece también a la Organización por los buenos servicios que le brinda la institución para su empresa comercial y de servicios.
texts.en:
The gentleman is married, lives in the city of Pilar’s San Miguel neighborhood, is a state employee and his wife’s a housewife. He owns his own house with all the basic comforts and owns his own means of transportation: a pick-up truck and a motorcycle. He is a merchant and also has a firm that provides meals. He is asking for funds to buy ingredients for his business like: flour, pasta, sugar, dairy products, baked goods, cooking oils and others. He has over 10 years experience in this line of work. He is grateful to the Organization for the good services it provides his commercial and service firm.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy flour, pasta, sugar, dairy products, baked goods, cooking oils and others.

loans.name: Giovanny

texts.es: Geovanny R. C., tiene la edad de 42 años, está casado y vive con su esposa y un hijo de 10 años. El crédito lo quiere para la compra de algunos terneros y su alimentación. Desea darle el adecuado mantenimiento al ganado para obtener el mayor ingreso posible cuando se vendan. También desea aumentar el número de animales y poder mantenerlos en mejores condiciones, cuenta con un área idónea para el mantenimiento y cría del ganado. Es la primera vez que realiza un crédito con FUDECOSUR y está muy contento con las facilidades que se le brindaron. Don Geovanny  tiene muchos años dedicado al ganado. El espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productor.
texts.en:
Geovanny R. C., 42, is married and lives with his wife and 10-year-old son. He wants funds to buy a few calves and to buy feed for them. He wants to provide his cattle with proper care so that they will produce the best possible sale price when time to sell them comes. He also wants to increase his herd size. He has an ideal site for their care. This is the first time he’s negotiated a loan with FUDECOSUR and he is very happy with the loan terms they offered. Geovanny has been a cattleman for many years. He hopes in future to provide his family with a better quality of life and a better economic stability as well as to continue to grow as a person and as a producer.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy cattle.

loans.name: Amalia Felicitas

texts.es: Doña Amalia es madre de 6 hijos, desde joven a prendió a trabajar en las ventas junto con su mama. Hace 10 años vende frutas y verduras que inicio con el objetivo de poder apoyar a su familia, y proporcionar a su familia los ingresos necesarios. Con los años ha logrado adquirir clientes, por lo que se siente muy contenta con este nuevo financiamiento que le será de mucha ayuda. Con este préstamo comprara productos como mangos, jocotes, naranjas, bananos y sandias  pues con una gran variedad de productos que ofrece sus clientes llegan más a frecuentemente a su establecimiento.
texts.en:
Amalia is the mother of six children. From the time she was young she has been working in sales alongside of her mother. For the past 10 years she has been selling fruits and vegetables something she started with the objective of supporting her family and providing them with the necessary income. Over the years she has accumulated many clients. She is very happy with this new funding because it will be very helpful to her work. With the loan she will buy more products like mangoes, plums, oranges, bananas, and watermelons so she can offer a greater variety of products to her clients so they come more frequently to her business.

Translated from Spanish by Cathy Coffman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working Capital

loans.name: Eulalia

texts.es:
Eulalia tiene 42 años de edad, es separada y tiene cuatro hijos, los cuales aún viven con ella, reside junto a su familia en el caserío San Martín, una zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande, un distrito agrícola caracterizado por su abundante producción de frutas las cuales suelen ser exportadas a diversos países, pertenece a la provincia de Piura y se encuentra ubicado en la región del mismo nombre, a mas de tres horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes en una bodega ubicada en la vivienda donde reside, ella ofrece a sus clientes todo tipo de productos de uso diario por los cuales tendrian que dirigirse hacia el pueblo de Tambogrande para poder adquirirlos. Este establecimiento es importante para su familia ya que gracias a el pueden sostenerse y salir adelante, durante el tiempo que lleva funcionando, Eulalia ha trabajado arduamente para poder mantenerlo y actualmente lo ha ampliado poco a poco.

Debido al buen trato que ofrece su negocio siempre cuenta con buena acogida, Eulalia desea adquirir mas productos de modo que pueda seguir satisfaciendo la demanda de sus clientes, para lograr su objetivo se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles.

Eulalia es una mujer bastante luchadora: ha sabido salir adelante y hacer progresar a su familia aun siendo madre soltera, ella desea seguir trabajando para poder sacar adelante a sus hijos. En la zona donde vive sus vecinos y conocidos le consideran una mujer tranquila y responsable.
texts.en:
Eulalia, 42, is separated and has four children who still live with her. She lives with her family in San Martín, a rural area of Tambogrande district, a farming district noted for its abundant fruit production that is usually exported to various countries. It’s part of Piura province located in Piura region over three hours from the city of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region’s capital. She sells basic needs items in a grocery store located in her home. She stocks all kinds of daily use articles which they would have to go to the town of Tambogrande to get. This establishment is important for her family because thanks to it they are able to sustain themselves and get ahead. During the time it’s been in operation, Eulalia has worked hard to maintain it and has gradually expanded it. Thanks to the good customer service she provides, she is well received. Eulalia would like to purchase more products so that she can continue to meet customer demand. In order to reach this goal, she needs to request a 2000 sol loan for the first time from Edpyme Alternativa. Eulalia is quite a tenacious woman. She has learned how to get ahead and push her family to succeed even though she’s a single mother. She wants to continue to work to raise her children. In the area where she resides her neighbors and acquaintances consider her to be a levelheaded, responsible woman.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy stock items for her store.

loans.name: Alcides

texts.es:
Alcides es un padre de familia de 33 años de edad que vive junto a su esposa y a sus cinco hijos en el caserío El Sandial, una zona rural perteneciente al distrito de Pítipo, ubicado en la provincia de Ferreñafe, a una hora y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a trabajar en labores asociadas a la agricultura desde hace ocho años, actualmente cuenta con un terreno de cultivo en donde suele sembrar algunos granos como maíz y algunas menestras como frijol (en la fotografía), este terreno se encuentra ubicado cerca a a zona en donde vive. Debido a que la economía de su familia depende principalmente de esta actividad el trata de dar lo mejor de si para poder sacarla adelante.

Alcides ha sembrado una pequeña parte de su terreno con frijol y ahora desea instalar maíz, actualmente ya cuenta con la semilla pero le hace falta dinero para adquirir algunos fertilizantes y pesticidas de modo que se pueda asegurar una buena producción, para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles.

Alcides es un padre bastante trabajador y entregado a su familia, su mayor anhelo es ver recompensado el esfuerzo de su trabajo con la mejora progresiva de la calidad de vida de los suyos. En la zona donde reside sus vecinos le consideran alguien tranquilo y servicial. En la imagen nos muestra su cultivo de frijol.
texts.en:
Alcides is a 33 year old parent. He lives with his wife and five children in the hamlet of El Sandial, a rural area close to the district of Pítipo, located in the province of Ferrañafe, an hour and a half from the city of Chiclayo.

He has worked in the agricultural business since he was eight years old. He now has a plot of land where he cultivates grains like corn and some legumes like beans (as in the photograph). This land is located close to where he lives. His family depends primarily on this economic activity so he tries his best to advance himself.

Alcides has planted a small part of his land with beans and now he would like to plant corn. He has already purchased the seeds but he doesn't have the money to buy the fertilizers and pesticides that will assure a good harvest. To achieve this goal he has asked for a loan of 2000 nuevos soles with Edpyme Alternativa.

Alcides is a very hard working father who is devoted to his family. His main desire is to see his hard work pay off and provide a greater quality of life for his family. In the area where he lives his neighbors consider him a very calm and helpful man.

This image shows him cultivating beans.

Translated from Spanish by Cathy Coffman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying fertilizers and pesticides to plant corn

loans.name: Yama De Amor 1, 2, 3 & 4 Group

texts.en:
Joelisa is the coordinator of her group, 'Yama D. Amor 1, 2, 3 & 4' ('Flame of love'). She makes her home in a simple structure with her parents and a child. She says that her most difficult challenge is to work and have a better future. In the meantime, she plans to continue to enjoy to studying and working in beauty activities.

Joelisa is excited to be taking her 11th loan with Esperanza, after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She has had her business for over six years, starting with her first Esperanza loan.

Joelisa plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying clothing and underwear. She will use the profits to invest in her business and to buy a refrigerator and food and clothes for her family. She also wants to save and buy her house in the not to distant future.

This associate began with Esperanza because the program motivates people to invest in business and work hard to become successful. Esperanza came to her impoverished village and she understood that this could be her answer to achieve a better life.

Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients generally, many of whom recently emigrated to the Dominican Republic from Haiti. Her group is located in Samana, a lush rugged peninsula with a nascent tourism industry. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic suffers from unreliable electricity and running water (none of which is potable).

loans.use: To buy clothing and underwear to sell

loans.name: Eliel

texts.es: Eliel, de 23 años, es un joven emprendedor, que vive en una casa alquilada en la ciudad de Lima con su pareja Diana de 21 años y sus dos pequeños hijos. Desde hace 4 años, se dedica a distribuir papa a los grandes restaurantes y pollerías de lima.  Labora en la ciudad de Lima, comprando varios sacos de papa que luego lava, pela y corta con maquinarias modernas, en el que luego son repartidas a sus clientes. En este negocio labora en compañía de su pareja, y siente que por fin puede darle a su familia una adecuada calidad de vida, pese a que el trabajo diario es sacrificado, por ello tiene que estar pendiente de la administración. Por otro lado, posee campos de cultivo en donde siembra arveja, es así que recibe ingresos adicionales a su economía. Él siempre fue un joven emprendedor y visionario, su mayor desea es implementar su negocio con mejores maquinarias que agilicen su trabajo. Este es el cuarto crédito con MFP,  y como siempre está seguro de poder pagar puntualmente cada cuota, de su deuda, pues le gusta ser responsable, por eso le gusta trabajar con los integrantes de su grupo comunal. Con el crédito que solicita, invertirá en la compra de una bolsa de semilla de arveja y 15 sacos de papa que procesará para vender.
texts.en:
Eliel, 23, is a young businessman who lives in a rented house with his partner, Diana, 21, and their two young children. For the past 4 years he has been selling potatoes to the big restaurants and the chicken rotisserie restaurants of Lima. He works in the city of Lima buying sacks of potatoes, washes them, and peels and cuts them up with modern machinery and then they are distributed to his customers. His partner works with him in this company and he feels that finally he can give his family an adequate quality of life, despite the fact that they have to sacrifice with the daily work by being careful with the managine. Besides, he has farmland where he grows beans, and thus gets additional earnings. He was always a hardworking young man with foresight, and his biggest dream is to start his own business with better machinery that will make his work easier. This is his fourth loan with MFP, and as always, he is sure to make each loan repayment on time. He likes to be responsible, and that is why he likes to work with the members of the communal group. With the loan that he is requesting he will buy a bag of bean seeds and 15 sacks of potatoes that he will process to sell.

Translated from Spanish by Miriam Palacio, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy 15 sacks of potatoes to process and then sell.

loans.name: Shirley

texts.es: Shirley C. V., tiene la edad de 42 años, está casada, y vive con el esposo  y sus dos hijos de 12 y 18 años de edad. El crédito lo quiere para la compra de ropa para venderla. Desea tener un inventario más variado de prendas de vestir, para ampliar su negocio.  Además,  ofrecer un mayor inventario y adquirir prendas de mayor calidad para los clientes que posee. Hace varios años que empezó este negocio viendo la necesidad de aportar a la economía de su hogar. Es la  primera vez que realiza un crédito con FUDECOSUR y está muy contenta con las facilidades que se le brindaron. Ella espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como comerciante.
texts.en:
Shirley C. V., 42, is married and lives with her husband and two children who are 12 and 18 years of age. She will use the loan to buy clothing to sell. She wants to have a varied stock available in order to expand her business. In addition, she wants to offer a more varied stock of better quality items to her customers. She started the business several years ago as a way to augment family income. This is her first loan with FUDECOSUR and she is very happy with the loan terms offered. She hopes in future to provide her family with a better quality of life and improved economic stability as well as to continue to grow both as a person and as a merchant.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: For clothing sales.

loans.name: Juana Maria

texts.es:
Juana tiene 52 años de edad, es separada y tiene dos hijos de los cuales uno reside con ella, su vivienda se encuentra ubicada en el sector La Primavera de la ciudad de Chiclayo,una ciudad bastante conocida por su movimiento comercial y de transporte, es la capital de la región Lambayeque.

Desde hace tres años tiene instalada en su vivienda una bodega en la cual ofrece a sus clientes todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad, abarrotes y bebidas, el negocio cuenta con muy buena acogida debido a que pone al alcance de la mano de sus clientes diversos productos de consumo diario por los cuales tendrían que dirigirse hacia el centro de la ciudad para adquirirlos. Como es la unica fuente de ingresos con la que cuenta, Juana trata de brindar a sus clientes un buen servicio.

Su clientela ha ido aumentando progresivamente y ello ha hecho que ella piese en ampliar su negocio con la compra de mas productos de modo que pueda satisfacer la demanda que posee. Para lograr su meta ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1200 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Juana es una mujer alegre y entregada a su familia, el desear que sus hijos se superen hizo que se esforzara al máximo en su trabajo y ahora se encuentra orgullosa, ya que ambos son buenas personas. Ella ya ha trabajado anteriormente con Nuestra Institución y ha demostrado puntualidad y responsabilidad al momento de asumir sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Juana, 52, is separated and has two children one of whom still lives with her. Her home is in the La Primavera sector of the city of Chiclayo, a city that is well known for its commercial activity and as a transportation hub; it is the capital of Lambayeque region. She has had a grocery store installed in her home for the last three years. She stocks all kinds of basic needs items, groceries, beverages. The store is well received because it puts several basic items within reach of customers who would otherwise have to travel downtown to get. Because it’s her only source of income Juana tries to provide her customers with good service. Her customer base has been gradually growing and this has led her to think about expanding her business adding more products to her stock so that she can meet growing demand. To reach this goal she has thought it convenient to request a 1200 new sol loan from Edpyme Alternativa. Juana is a cheerful woman who is dedicated to her family. Her wish that her children get ahead in life motivated her to exert the maximum effort in her work and now she is proud that both of them have become upstanding citizens. She has collaborated with our Institution in the past and has demonstrated punctuality and responsibility with regards to her repayment obligations.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy stock items for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy two heifers.

loans.name: Mayela

texts.es: Mayela V. Z., tiene la edad de 49 años, está viuda, y vive con sus tres hijas. El crédito lo quiere para la compra de una computadora. Desea comprar la computadora para que sus hijas que estudian cuenten con una herramienta tan importante hoy día para el estudio, con el fin de que puedan realizar sus trabajos.  Doña Mayela se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de café. Es la  primera vez que realiza un crédito con FUDECOSUR y está muy contenta con las facilidades que se le brindaron. Ella espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productora.
texts.en:
Mayela V. Z., 49, is a widow and lives with her three daughters. She will use the funds to buy a computer. She wants to buy the computer so that her daughters that are in school will have a tool that is so important nowadays for school so that they can do their assignments. Mayela is a farmer, specifically coffee. This is her first loan request from FUDECOSUR and she is very happy with the terms offered. She hopes in future to provide a better quality of life and improved financial stability for her family as well as to continue to grow both as a person and as a farmer.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy a computer.

loans.name: Segundo Julian

texts.es:
Segundo Julian M. C. tiene 29 anos. Es casado y vive en el canton de Ventanas en la provincia de Los Rios. Tiene 4 hijos que se llaman Nathaly, Bayron, Brayon, y Estalin. 

Segundo es un socio de la ventanilla rural Narcisa de Jesús. Son 15 socios en total, que en la mayoridad se dedican a la agricultura.

Segundo se dedica a la agricultura. Siembra maíz y arroz. Hace las compras y las ventas de sus productos en el canton de Ventanas. 

Solicita el credito para su agricultura. Esta préstamo lo ayudara en mejorar su situación economico. Su sueno es comprar un terreno propio. Un desafío que se ha enfrentado en su trabajo es que tiene enfermedades y plagas en su maíz, uno en específico que se llama ¨longosta.¨  

En su tiempo libre le gusta estar con la familia.
texts.en:
Segundo Julian M. C. is 29 years old, married, and lives in the canton of Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos. He has four children named Nathaly, Bayron, Brayon, and Estalin.

Segundo is a member of the Communal Bank “Narcisa de Jesús”. There are 15 members in total, most of whom engage in agriculture.

Segundo is a farmer who grows corn and rice. He buys and sells his products in the canton of Ventanas. Segundo is requesting a loan to use for his farming activities since it will help improve his financial situation. His dream is to purchase his own land. Among the challenges he faces in his work are the diseases and pests that impact his corn crop. One such pest is called “langosta”.

In his free time, Segundo enjoys being with his family.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Operating capital for his farming activities

loans.name: Cesar Adolfo

texts.es:
Cesar Adolfo C. M. tiene 27 anos. Es soltero y vive con sus padres en el canton de Ventanas en la província de Los Rios. 

Cesar es un socio de la ventanilla rural Narcisa de Jesús. Son 15 socios en total, que en la mayoridad se dedican a la agricultura.

Cesar se dedica a la agricultura, al cultivo de maíz. Hace las compras y las ventas de sus productos en el canton de Ventanas. 

Solicita el credito para el trabajo de maíz. Con el apoyo de esta préstamo mejorara su situación economico. Su sueno es prosperar mas de sus metas y seguir mas adelante. 

Le gusta hacer deportes como el futbol y el boli.
texts.en:
Cesar Adolfo C. M. is 27 years old. He is single and lives with his parents in Ventanas Canton, Los Rios Province. Cesar is a member of the Narcisa de Jesús solidarity group. There are 15 members altogether, most of whom are farmers. Cesar is a corn farmer. He makes his purchases and sales in Ventanas Canton. He is asking for the loan for working his corn. With the help of the loan he will improve his economic situation. His dream is to prosper more by meeting his goals and move further ahead. He likes to play sports like soccer and volleyball.

Translated from Spanish by Danielle Maxson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Sowing corn

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy three heifers.

loans.name: Pablo David

texts.es:
Pablo es un padre de familia de 58 años de edad que vive en la ciudad de Chiclayo con su esposa y el último de sus hijos de 20 años de edad que se encuentra estudiando una carrera técnica.

Desde 1997 Pablo posee un pequeño taller en el lugar vive, allí brinda servicios de reparación de artefactos electrodomésticos y aunque su negocio esté lejos de la zona en donde se agrupan otros establecimientos que mantienen la misma actividad, el se las ingenia para seguir brindando este servicio a sus clientes habituales. Adicionalmente  adquiere artefactos usados para repararlos y luego revenderlos. Con estas actividades el sostiene la economía de su familia, por lo que siempre trata de ofrecer un buen servicio.

El ya ha trabajado anteriormente con el Fondo Kiva y se encuentra muy gradecido con las personas que le apoyaron en esa oportunidad, en aquella oportunidad pudo adquirir algunos repuestos que le ayudaron a brindar un mejor servicio, actualmente está solicitando 1800 nuevos soles los cuales piensa utilizar en la compra de artefactos usados con los cuales pues ampliar su negocio de reparación y venta.

Pablo tiene muy buenas referencias laborales y personales de sus clientes y vecinos, y lo que más anhela es poder solventar los gastos económicos de su hijo hasta que termine su carrera.
texts.en:
Pablo, 58, lives in the city of Chiclayo with his wife and the youngest of his children who is 20 years old and studying a technical career. Since 1997 Pablo has had a small workshop in his home where he repairs home appliances. Although is shop is located far from the area where other similar businesses are congregated, he finds ways to continue to provide service to his regular customers. In addition, he acquires used appliances to repair and resell. These activities make it possible for him to support his family so he always strives to provide good service. He has collaborated with Kiva previously and is very grateful to the people who helped him out on that occasion. He was able to buy some replacement parts that helped him provide better service. Currently, he is asking for an 1800 new sol loan to buy used appliances with which to expand his repair and sales business. Pablo has very good work and personal references from his customers and neighbors. What he wants most is to be able to afford do pay his son’s expenses until he finishes his schooling.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy used appliances to repair and resell.

loans.name: Dora Elia

texts.es: La Señora Dora Elia es una mujer muy trabajadora, ella tiene varios empleos , en uno de ellos trabaja como empleada domestica desde hace muchos años, ella enviudo hace tiempo y se a dedicado solo a trabajar, Vive sola en la casa que le dejo su marido. La señora Dora requiere de este crédito para colocar una reja en la parte de afuera de la casa, ya que con la que cuenta es de madera y teme por su seguridad, ya que esta sola en la vivienda.
texts.en:
Dora Elia is a very hard working woman. She has several jobs. In one of them she works as a domestic employee; she’s been in this job for many years. She was widowed a long time ago and she has always worked. She lives alone in the house her husband left her. Dora needs this loan to install a metal fence around her house because the one she currently has is wood and she fears for her safety because she lives alone in the house.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To install a metal fence.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To install safety devices on doors and windows.

loans.name: Sugey

texts.es: Sugey es una mujer muy trabajadora, que le ayuda a su esposo con todos los gastos del hogar, su marido trabaja en una planta de refrescos y ella se levanta a las 4:00 de la mañana  para hacer tortillas de harina para después venderlas, tiene tres hijos pequeños y ella y su esposo ven por la mejor calidad de vida para ellos.  Este crédito lo requieren para colocar una barda en la parte del frente de la vivienda para la seguridad de ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Sugey is a hard working woman who helps her husband meet household expenses. Her husband works in a beverage plant and she rises every morning at 4am to make flour tortillas to sell. She has three small children and she and her husband strive for a better quality of life for them. She needs the loan to build a wall in the front of their house for better security for her and her family.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To install a wall in the front of the house.

loans.name: Florentino

texts.es:
Florentino tiene 58 años de edad, es viudo y vive junto al menor de sus hijos en el caserío Tolón, una zona rural del distrito de Yonán – Tembladera, distrito de la sierra norte del país, se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Contumaza, región Cajamarca, a una hora y cuarenta y cinco minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la agricultura desde que era joven, el cuenta con un terreno de cultivo donde suele sembrar diversos granos como maíz por ejemplo, durante todos estos años el ha dependido de esta actividad para poder sostener a su familia por lo que ha trabajado arduamente para poder sacarlos adelante.

Actualmente ha sembrado maíz y el espera obtener una buena producción para poder asegurar el mantenimiento de los suyos, para lograr su objetivo piensa adquirir fertilizantes y pesticidas, para adquirirlos ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Florentino es una persona tranquila y responsable, las personas que le conocen le consideran alguien muy trabajador. El ya ha trabajado anteriormente con Nuestra Institución y ha demostrado puntualidad y responsabilidad al momento de asumir sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Florentino, 58, is a widower. He lives with his youngest son in Tolón, a rural sector of Yonán – Tembladera district, a district in the country’s northern mountains. It is located in Contumaza province, Cajamarca region, an hour and forty-five minutes from the city of Chiclayo. He has been a farmer since he was a young man. He has a field where he grows grains like corn, for example. All these years he has depended on this activity to support his family so he has always worked hard to provide for them. He has planted corn and he hopes to obtain a good crop yield to insure his loved ones’ wellbeing. To reach his goal he needs to buy fertilizers and pesticides so he has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new sol loan to buy them. Florentino is a levelheaded, responsible person. Folks who know him consider him to be very hard working. He has collaborated with Our Institution previously and has shown punctuality and responsibility with respect to repayments.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy pesticides and fertilizers for corn crop maintenance.

loans.name: Liana

texts.es:
Liana es una madre de familia 22 de años de edad que vive junto a su familia en el distrito de Chepén un distrito agrícola de regular movimiento comercial ubicado en la provincia del mismo nombre, pertenece a la región La Libertad y se encuentra situada a una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes desde hace mas de un año, ella cuenta con un pequeño establecimiento situado en su domicilio, allí ofrece a sus clientes todo tipo de productos de uso diario por los cuales tendrían que dirigirse hacia el centro de la ciudad para adquirirlos, esta actividad es una fuente importante de ingresos para su familia ya que gracias a ella ayuda a su esposo, que es carpintero, con los gastos de la familia.

Liana desea ampliar su bodega comprando mas productos de modo que pueda incrementar sus ventas y percibir mas ganancias, para lograr su objetivo se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles.

Ella es una mujer responsable y muy trabajadora su mayor anhelo es seguir adelante para poder brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Liana is a 22-year-old mother who lives with her family in the district of Chepén. It is an agricultural district with a regular flow of trade, located in the province of the same name. It belongs to the La Libertad region and lies one hour from the city of Chiclayo. She has worked selling basic goods and groceries for more than a year. She has a small store located in her house, where she offers her customers all types of staple products. They would otherwise have to travel downtown to buy these items. This business is an important source of income for Liana's family, allowing her to help her husband, a carpenter, with the family's expenses. Liana wants to expand her inventory, buying more products so that she can increase her sales and earn more profits. To achieve this goal, she has decided to request a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1500 Peruvian new soles. She is a responsible and very hard-working woman, and her greatest desire is to get ahead so she can provide her family with a better quality of life.

Translated from Spanish by Patricia Linderman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying products to expand the store she operates in her home
